attributes.action: Approve funding for the expansion of the Midland Metro Light Rail System and promote the creation of such systems across the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Transport in the West Midlands is a mess, which is why i am asking the Prime Minister to promise funding for the Midland Metro Tram Network to expand so the West Midlands gets the rapid transit system it really needs.
